alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, southwestern Golden Valley and northeastern Sweet Grass Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles south of Harlowton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, southwestern Golden Valley and northeastern Sweet Grass Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
